Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject

Class TriviaScoreDatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.TriviaScoreDatabaseHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class TriviaScoreDatabaseHelper extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
This class serves as a helper for managing the Trivia scores database using SQLite. It handles creating the database, defining the table structure, and providing methods to add, delete, and retrieve Trivia scores from the database.

    • onCreate

      public void onCreate(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
      Called when the database is created for the first time. It executes the SQL query to create the score table.
      Specified by:
      onCreate in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      Parameters:
      db - The SQLiteDatabase instance representing the database.

    • onUpgrade

      public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db, int oldVersion, int newVersion)
      Called when the database needs to be upgraded (e.g., when the DATABASE_VERSION is increased). This method is not implemented in this case.
      Specified by:
      onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      Parameters:
      db - The SQLiteDatabase instance representing the database.
      oldVersion - The old version of the database.
      newVersion - The new version of the database.

    • addScore

      public void addScore(TriviaScore score)
      Adds a new TriviaScore entry to the database.
      Parameters:
      score - The TriviaScore instance representing the score to be added.

    • deleteScore

      public void deleteScore(String name)
      Deletes a TriviaScore entry from the database based on the player's name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player whose score should be deleted.

    • isNameAlreadyExist

      public boolean isNameAlreadyExist(String name)
      Checks if a player name already exists in the database (duplicate entry check).
      Parameters:
      name - The name to be checked for existence in the database.
      Returns:
      True if the player name already exists in the database, false otherwise.

    • getTop10score

      public List<TriviaScore> getTop10score()
      Retrieves the top 10 Trivia scores from the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing the top 10 TriviaScore instances.
